snippet.title: Double Whammy - Official Release Window Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Double Whammy is an action-simulation game that follows Gigi, a teenage guitarist, as she navigates the challenges of balancing her day job at a guitar shop with nightly battles against interdimensional monsters. Check out the latest Double Whammy trailer to see gameplay and the release window reveal. Double Whammy will be available on PC in late 2025.
